snippet: The journalist and author, who died in a car crash in June, had been working on a novel based on his own life, which will be released next summer.
abstract: Blue Rider Press will posthumously publish Michael Hastings book The Last Magazine; Hastings, journalist and author, was killed in car crash in June 2013.
lead_paragraph: The journalist and author, who died in a car crash in June, had been working on a novel based on his own life, which will be released next summer.
